text: Alicia Borrachero Bonilla (born 14 February 1968) is a Spanish actress. She is popular thanks to her roles on television, but she has also taken part in theatre plays and movies. She studied drama at Nazareth College, and in the drama training atelier in Madrid. She married actor Ben Temple in 2003, and they have one child, born in November 2005. == Theatre == *Don Quixote *Things I forgot to remember *La fabulosa historia de Diego Marín *Muerte en Granada *Sangre Ciega *The Killer Tongue *Tres palabras *Shooting Elizabeth == Filmography == {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" ! colspan="4" style="background: LightSteelBlue;" | Film |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" !
